agentCard.name: Echo Agent
agentCard.description: Enterprise-Grade Security Hardened Echo Plugin: Advanced text echoing with comprehensive input validation, Universal Input Sanitizer integration, and multi-layer threat detection. Prevents SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, and command injection attacks.
